results.title: Living not dying
results.brief_description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “For the past six years, I have been living with, not dying from, advanced breast cancer. My original diagnosis was in 1996, when I was 40 years old.”
results.description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “For the past six years, I have been living with, not dying from, advanced breast cancer. My original diagnosis was in 1996, when I was 40 years old.”
description_for_label: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “For the past six years, I have been living with, not dying from, advanced breast cancer. My original diagnosis was in 1996, when I was 40 years old.”

results.title: Isolated but not Alone
results.brief_description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia.I love living in the bush, I especially love rearing my kids in a rural area. It’s something about the sense of freedom, space and community. But distance can be hard when you have a serious illness.
results.description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia.I love living in the bush, I especially love rearing my kids in a rural area. It’s something about the sense of freedom, space and community. But distance can be hard when you have a serious illness.

results.title: Here's to extremes and my journey beyond
results.creator_credit: Kim Davis, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: All her life, Kim Davis believed she could do anything. And she still does, despite the efforts of society or even fate. From a line of strong women, she refuses to let anything beat her and is determined to help others.
results.title_for_label: Here’s to extremes and my journey beyond
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kim Davis, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Journey's rewards
results.creator_credit: Darren Kane, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Darren Kane first travelled to India, he loved it. However, his time there set him on another journey, one that would take him around the world and deep inside himself.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Darren Kane, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: This is my offering
results.creator_credit: Stefanie Christian, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Stefanie Christian dedicates her story to the person who supported her throughout her illness, loved her unconditionally and helped her to envisage a bright future full of adventure.

results.creator_credit: Peter Davis, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Boy from the block
results.creator_credit: Jeffrey Robertson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeffrey Robertson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.
description_for_label: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.

results.title: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Eight members of the community tell their stories of living with HIV. With a fierce zest for life and adventure, they tell of how their lives have changed but also of how they have fought back against the disease and look forward to the journey ahead.
results.title_for_label: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project
results.description: Eight members of the community tell their stories of living with HIV. With a fierce zest for life and adventure, they tell of how their lives have changed but also of how they have fought back against the disease and look forward to the journey ahead.
